thread.title: Hilary Duff Reflects on the ‘Hardest' and ‘Best’ Years of Her Life as She Celebrates Her Son’s 5th Birthday
thread.title_full: Hilary Duff Reflects on the ‘Hardest' and ‘Best’ Years of Her Life as She Celebrates Her Son’s 5th Birthday

title: Hilary Duff Reflects on the ‘Hardest' and ‘Best’ Years of Her Life as She Celebrates Her Son’s 5th Birthday
text:
A post shared by Hilary Duff (@hilaryduff) on Mar 18, 2017 at 10:28pm PDT 
The Younger s star, 29, then threw him a party on Sunday, complete with face painting and even a visit from an Oscar Mayer Wiener food truck. Snapchat 
Duff shared several videos and photos to Snapchat as they partied in the yard of her Los Angeles home. Snapchat 
Although she adores being a mommy, she admits being a divorced, single mom “sucks.” 
"Some of my friends tell me, 'God, it must be so nice, you get a break from your kid because you share him,’” she said in an interview in Redbook ’s March 2017 issue. “I'm divorced, and it sucks. Well, it did suck for a while; now it's just normal. But it's true, I do get a break. I had Luca by myself for a few weeks, no help, when Mike was on the road, and when he got home I was like, 'He's yours! Bye!'" 
The couple split in 2014 after nearly four years of marriage, but Duff is now dating music producer Matthew Koma .
